name: I Caught Glimpses of Life Before I Gladly Embraced Hibernation
name_original: I Caught Glimpses of Life Before I Gladly Embraced Hibernation
description:
• assemblage of memories, writings, & reflections from the past two years
  • created for bitsy jam #68 - hibernation 
  • begin game, press down to scroll & right to make a choice
  • multiple pathways & one secret ending
  • created with bitsy, add bitsy audio tool, & audacity 
  • loop sample taken from "fiver's plan" by terminal orchestra
